entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as being alone in a cell in Azkaban, surrounded by dementors.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is described as the location where Luna is being held.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as surrounding Luna in Azkaban.

entities.name: hallows
entities.description: The Hallows is mentioned as something Harry has been contemplating.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: Harry thinks about casting a Patronus with the blackthorn wand.

entities.name: blackthorn wand
entities.description: The blackthorn wand is mentioned as something Harry wants to try using.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand, also known as the Deathstick, is described as unbeatable and invincible.

entities.name: deathstick
entities.description: The Deathstick is mentioned as another name for the Elder Wand.

entities.name: coast
entities.description: The coast is described as where Harry and his companions pitch their tent.

entities.name: tent
entities.description: Tents are mentioned as being used by Harry and his companions.

relationships.description: Harry feels ashamed of himself for forgetting about Luna in Azkaban.
Harry thinks about casting a Patronus with the blackthorn wand.
Harry desires the Elder Wand, also known as the Deathstick.
Dementors are surrounding Luna in Azkaban.
